More examplesFewer examplesThe nightclub has a very fashionable clientele.She spends the summer jet-setting around the fashionable European resorts.I tend to wear clothes that are practical rather than fashionable.Vogue magazine quickly became the bible of fashionable women.In the 1980s, shoulder pads were very fashionable in women's clothes.
